group_1.textCenter: What did you call me out here for?
Juri.

group_1.textLeft: We're comin' tonight.

group_1.textRight: You came all the way out here to tell me that @in person...?

group_1.textLeft: This mental warfare shit doesn't suit @Juri the Great.
That's why I came to tell you, so we could start @off on equal footing.
I'm not lyin', we're comin' tonight. @Why don't ya head back and rally your team?

group_1.textRight: I hate to tell you, but our morale hasn't fallen as @much as you might think it has.

group_1.textLeft: That's great news.

group_1.textRight: Juri... This is your last chance to turn back...

group_1.textLeft: You still think I'll stop just 'cause Witches are @reappearing in the city?
We've seen a few on our end, too.
But that could just be coincidence. There's @no guarantee they'll keep showin' up.
There's hardly a reason for us to call@off the war at this point.

group_1.textRight: Enough about the Witches. You're really just @after me, aren't you?
If we can avoid getting the others involved, @I don't mind fighting you here and now.

group_1.textLeft: That's a temptin' offer, but backin' down now @would make me look bad in front of Ryuugasaki.
I knew you'd refuse to fight me unless @I took things this far.
So I did everything I had to, which included @draggin' all the other Magical Girls into this.

group_1.textRight: Why is it so important for you @to fight me...?

group_1.textLeft: It's in my nature. @You know that, don't ya?
I've been a troublemaker since I was a kid. I won't @hesitate to fight if I don't like somethin'.
The longer I have to hold back, the more I'll explode @in the end. It's caused a lot of trouble for my old man.

group_1.textRight: That's why I've always put up with @your attitude.

group_1.textLeft: I really do appreciate it.
You're the only one who can handle @the flames of Juri the Great.
But my loss to you has been burnin' inside of @me... I've been holdin' it in for a full year now.
And tonight, I can finally let that rage free.

group_1.textRight: I suppose I have no choice but to @embrace your frustration...
No complaints, no matter which side loses. @I'll bring an end to those pent-up feelings.

group_1.textCenter: Thanks, Sis,
for accepting my "sickness".

group_1.textLeft: Don't forget the warmth of this life, @okay...?
The next time we meet, @I'll burn you down.

group_1.textRight: This tiger is going to devour you, dragon.

group_1.textCenter: Don't hate, don't be jealous, @and don't be selfish.
Always work hard for others, and pray for @peace, both of the world and of yourself.
As much as I wanted to avoid war, @I'm going to fight anyway...
I swear I'll make this time the last.
Is it wrong that I've chosen to fight...?

group_1.narration: "If this is the final one, @there's no other choice. @If war truly can't be avoided, @then you have your answer."

group_1.textCenter: Right...
The tiger and dragon are about to clash...
But the snake will be the winner~
Listen up! The tiger and dragon are @about to start fighting~
I'm not sure exactly when, @but it'll be tonight.
Your teams should contact all of you @before then, so play along for now~
I'll send my instructions later.
So, everyone, @make sure you've got your devices on-hand,
okay~?
(Since Juri came all the way out to the bridge, @she must know about the stones...)
(Are they going to use Monzenbashi like we @planned, or East and West Oogibashi...?)
(We should probably change our plan...)
